name: PKCanvasViewDelegate
desc: Methods for monitoring drawing related changes in a canvas view.

items.name: func canvasViewDrawingDidChange(PKCanvasView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the contents of the current drawing changed.

items.name: func canvasViewDidFinishRendering(PKCanvasView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the previously drawn content is ready to display.

items.name: func canvasViewDidBeginUsingTool(PKCanvasView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user started a new drawing sequence with the currently selected tool.

items.name: func canvasViewDidEndUsingTool(PKCanvasView)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user ended a drawing sequence with the tool they were using.
